text: Fredric Gerson Levin (March 29, 1937 â€“ January 12, 2021) was an American lawyer and philanthropist. He worked for Levin Papantonio Law Firm in Florida. The Fredric G. Levin College of Law at the University of Florida is named for him because of a donation he made to the school in 1999. He was born in Pensacola, Florida. In January 2016, Levin was diagnosed with lung cancer. He died from COVID-19 in Gainesville, Florida on January 12, 2021 at the age of 83.Famed Pensacola Attorney Fred Levin has died at the age of 83 from COVID-19 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Florida Category:People from Pensacola, Florida
title: Fred Levin
